verbose_text: However, although there is a large peak in the high-beta / low-gamma-band NPD for the M2 --> STN interaction (XREF_FIG), if we examine the same connection but conditioned on LFPs recorded at either STR (XREF_FIG) or GPe (XREF_FIG), we see that the conditioning significantly reduces NPD in the control animals (M2 --> STN conditioned on STR and M2 --> STN conditioned on GPe), suggesting any directed coherence between M2 and STN in these animals is routed via striatal-pallidal connections.
